Detailed Description

Interface for a folder monitor.

Observers of this interface are notified about all changes made in the monitored directory, such as removing or adding files, changes in file contents or file attributes.

Definition at line 22 of file IDirectoryMonitor.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ifpf::IDirectoryMonitor::ChangeFlags

File system change flags.

Enumerator:
CF_FILES_ADDED  File(s) were added.
CF_FILES_REMOVED  File(s) were removed.
CF_FILES_MODIFIED  File(s) were modified.
CF_FILES_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED  File's attributes were changed.
CF_SOME_CHANGES  All possible changes.

Reimplemented from istd::IChangeable.
